name: Compact Hangouts in Gmail (TalkGadget)
description:
1. Hide userpics
  2. Hide last messages
  3. Hide date of last messages
  4. Compact userlist
  5. Compact contacts card
  6. Compact chat window
  7. Hide userstatus
additional_info: v2.0 Feb 07, 2018 Fully rewritten style. v1.2.2 Jun 17, 2015 Fix for size of userlist item. v1.2.1 Mar 27, 2015 Paddings in chat window was reduced. v1.2 Mar 17, 2015 The contact card was minimised. v1.1 Mar 5, 2015 1. Fix for not-showing status image different from online. 2. More compact! 3. Some other fixes and modifications. v1.0 Jun 23, 2014 .Yf – userpic (hidden) .ng – block with message (hidden) .Vx – date of last message (hidden) .Xk – block with userlist items (height reduced) .Ux – user status image (position fixed) .ye – block with user status image (width reduced)
